name: Action
description: Fast-paced gameplay that keeps the player pumped and engaged.

name: Adventure
description: The game has a large variety of areas that are unfamiliar, waiting for the player to uncover them throughout the journey.

name: Puzzle-solving
description: The player's logic and problem solving skills are constantly tested by the game.

name: Platformer
description: Includes a lot of jumping and climbing, involves knowing the controls and movement physics intensely.

name: Shooter
description: The game has a lot of enemies and the gameplay heavily involves shooting things.

name: RPG
description: The gameplay can include optional events that the player can choose to progress or build themselves.

name: Casual
description: This game doesn't require a massive investment of skill or time, you don't have to be a master to enjoy the ride.

name: Story-driven
description: Progress is frequently advanced by the narrative using dialogue or bits of information important to the plot.

name: Mystery
description: The player is out to uncover a secret and solve the unknown.

name: Fantasy
description: The supernatural and otherworldly are the norm, a magically vivid world that doesn't care about being believable.

name: Surreal
description: Qualities of crazy and dreamy occurrences happening in a grounded world.

name: Horror
description: The game is focused on scaring and startling you with dreadful moments, usually with jumpscares or violent scenes.

name: Sci-Fi
description: The game may have themes of futuristic science, advanced technology, or the strange extraterrestrial world.

name: Humor
description: Jokeful and satirical themes designed to make you laugh.

name: Remake
description: A mostly faithful recreation of a preexisting creation.

name: Reimagining
description: Reinventing a preexisting creation in your own way with usually extreme and drastic changes.

name: Metafiction
description: The game carries a self-aware narrative, the player is constantly reminded they are playing obviously fictional work.

name: Stealth
description: The game facilitates ways for the player to remain undetected and sneak around as direct combat is not always an option.

name: Thriller
description: The game's mood keeps players on their toes with suspense, anticipation, and constant anxiety.

name: Survival
description: Includes elements where the gameplay involves the player to actively stay alive.

name: Historical
description: There are elements that are related or linked to non-fictitious history.

name: Exploration
description: The player is usually encouraged to explore a very large or complex environment to be able to progress.
